title: EastEnders fans disgusted as Ben sends funeral flowers to Bex after suicide attempt
text:

EastEnders viewers were disgusted tonight as Ben Mitchell sent funeral flowers to Bex Fowler after her suicide attempt.

Ben went full Phil Mitchell tonight as he continued to threaten Martin into following his demands.

He still has the bloody wrench that was used to whack Phil over the head with, which also has Stacey's fingerprints on it.

As a result, Stacey and Martin fled the Square, but he returned to be with his daughter.

But viewers were disgusted when Ben decided to have a flower wreath with 'Fowler' on it delivered to Martin's door.

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

Bex tried to kill herself after struggling to cope with the pressure, but was thankfully found by mum Sonia in time

One fuming viewer tweeted: "Ben! Just NO! What's wrong with you? #EastEnders."

While another commented: "Martin should punch Ben for doing that! After what Bex has been through #EastEnders."

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

A third remarked: "ben! is! disgusting! #EastEnders."

"I love you Ben but that was to much #EastEnders," another wrote.

One commented: "Sending a wreath to Martin was probably not Ben's best idea #MaxBowden #BenMitchell #EastEnders #TeamMax."

"Ben can be so vile. @bbceastenders #EastEnders," another seethed.

*EastEnders returns tomorrow night at 8pm on BBC One
